public class Dialog_Utils
extends Object
A set of useful utilities for creating dialogs.

Dialog_Utils()

center(Frame)
Centers the given frame in the current display.
get_multiline_component(String)
Returns an interface component made of several labels, each of which contains one line of text.

Dialog_Utils 
 public Dialog_Utils()

center 
 public static void center(Frame frame)
Centers the given frame in the current display.

get_multiline_component 
 public static Component get_multiline_component(String string)
Returns an interface component made of several labels, each of which contains one line of text. This works around the fact that java.awt.Label does not support multi-line text.
